features: All in One Design: Universal headphone stand, 3 USB charging ports ( 20W x 1 USB C and 2 USB A 18W), 2 outlets Power Strip(1250W rated power) Great gift for Grandson,Son,Boy,Men,Husband and Boyfriend.

3 Port Smart Fast Charger(QC3.0 and PD Fast Charge): It can detects your device automatically to deliver its fastest possible charge speed up to 2.4 amps per port or 4 amps overall,more convenient to charge your smartphone, ipad, tablet or other smart device without plug in wall.

2 Safe Outlet Power Socket: You can charge your laptops, printers, bluetooth speakers, Lamp, Xbox 360 One, PS4, PS VR,Oculus,Vive and other devices with this outlets power strip. The Total Output of this AC Outlet is 1250W.

Safe Features: Fire-resistant and hardened plastic outer shell for durability, no risk of wood flammable and metal leakage,build-in premium circuitry and microchip, ensure device safety.Multi-protection system shields everything from overload, short-circuits, over-current and other charging issues.

Perfect Desk Accessory: Combine headphone stand and power strip to one device, provide you more function - conveniently store your not in use headphones, power you devices and organize your desk space.COZOO headset stand is the best gifts for men and gamers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty cool idea!
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he LOVES it. He has a Switch, and there's so many things that have to be plugged in to run and/or charge: the controller, headset, and Switch, plus he has his cell phone plugged in bc he uses the Bluetooth. He loves having the ability to plug everything in in one place, and just have one thing plugging into the receptacle, plus there is a headset stand, so that the headset isn't just laying down wherever, making it quickly accessible. Before this product he had thing plugged up everywhere in order to have enough receptacles for everything. If you are an organized person this is the perfect gaming product for you! No more cords all over the room! Love love love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very high quality
reviews.reviewText: This product works so well we are using all the plugins on it and it works perfectly makes everything more organized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he absolutely loved it. He has a DJ and has a whole DJ set up an extra room in our house. He’s just been laying his headphones on the mixer and it has been bothering him. I thought this one was cool because it changed colors and lights up and so does his mixer so it matches perfectly. Also, you can charge things with it, which he thought was so useful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quick charging and have base not easily tipped over.
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my dad, he loves it! There was a bit of a mixup on the initial order, they sent me the completely wrong item!! But I am glad I gave them a second chance and got this.The base is quite heavy so even if you accidentally nudge it, it is unlikely to tip over and spill your expensive headphones/headset on the ground.The charging is spot on, can charge two phones and a Bluetooth headset with ease, and quite quickly at that! It also has two outlets on the back for additional charging or if you just need an extra couple plugs for your PC. Very useful!As for looks, I do wish it came in more colors, and the stem and rest for the headphones themselves are thin and light. While this does make the center of gravity very low which makes it not topple over easy, if it DOES topple over, I fear they might snap. Also the top is molded plastic and you can still see some chunks of plastic from the molding process, which doesn't look as nice, can be trimmed with a razor but shouldn't have to take that step.The base's construction is very high quality, copper power connections, and there is an on/off switch so it isn't constantly drawing power.Overall I would give this product a solid B, mainly due to the excellent base design. Would definitely recommend it! Assuming they send the right product of course lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and very helpful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is cheaply made, the stand is not sturdy enough to hold the headphones, it kept tipping over whenever they were placed on there. It has an extra USB plug in to be able to charge which is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought two - work great - no surprises
reviews.reviewText: These are a great solution to keep my sons’ pricey headsets off the floor, tables, counters - the extra plugs are useful also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Brother got me this as a gift and I couldn’t be happier. Chargers all my equipment and holds my headphones. Love the colors of the light flashing and I would say it is a perfect fit for my game room setup.
O si en verdad que les puedo decir de este producto estoy super contento me encanto mucho los compre porque estoy armando mi estudio gamer, los recomiendo
Works as intended. Sturdy. Easy to charge your phone or headset

First of all, I don’t understand why it’s asking me to rate its “Adhesion” when it doesn’t “adhere”/stick to the surface you put it on. If it’s talking about the grip of the Anti-slip mat, then I would give it a 4.5. More weight on the base would probably help it more but it’s not even a big dealThe stand itself is great. Its sleek and functional. No issues at all with the outlet. The USB ports were a bit difficult to plug into but they’re all functional and they function WELL. Charges my devices fast.What I wish they would have included were optional mounting strips. I have a dog and I’m very cautious about the possibility of her snagging on a cord and dragging the stand and everything else connected to it or hitting the desk and knocking things over. I used the Scotch® Clear Mounting Strips, 1 in x 3 in to mount it on the desk so it felt sturdier.I also wish the headset rest was just a little bit longer so you have the option to have 2 headsets on it (one on each side). I don’t think it would hurt it aesthetically.Overall, its a great product for what its for and more. My husband liked it too so I might gift him his own to mount on his side table. Maybe it will help him organize his messy gaming area. So its a gift for me too lmao.

reviews.reviewTitle: Que me sirvió para lo que quería
love the lighting and charging features
reviews.reviewText: bought this for my bf for Christmas, he loves the different color settings. this is perfect for cord management, he is able to plug his phone, lights, and controller chargers into the stand and it works perfectly. after reading some reviews I was nervous about the charging power but it has not been a problem for us at all. super happy he has somewhere cool to store his headphones
